thread.title: Founder President and CEO of Jarvis Insurance and Financial Strategies Edie A. Jarvis ChFEBC SFA featured on CBS as Guest on Success Today.
thread.title_full: Founder President and CEO of Jarvis Insurance and Financial Strategies Edie A. Jarvis ChFEBC SFA featured on CBS as Guest on Success Today. | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Founder President and CEO of Jarvis Insurance and Financial Strategies Edie A. Jarvis ChFEBC SFA featured on CBS as Guest on Success Today.
text:
(MENAFN Press) Edie A. Jarvis was recently seen on NBC CBS ABC and FOX network affiliates around the country as a guest on Success Today with Bob Guiney. 
Ormond Beach FL  August 3 2015 – Edie A. Jarvis ChFEBC Founder President and CEO of Jarvis Insurance and Financial Strategies was recently featured as a guest on Success Today with Bob Guiney. The show was filmed in Orlando Florida and features an interview with Nick Nanton ESQ. as host. The episode with Edie Jarvis recently aired on affiliates of ABC NBC CBS and FOX around the country.
Edie has been in the financial services industry for nearly 20 years.  In 1996 Edie started her career with a captive agency before realizing how limiting it could be to herself and her clients. After gaining more industry knowledge and experience both in the field and in the classroom Edie was fortunate enough to have the ability to open her own firm.   She is now able to offer EVERY investment option available to her clients not just a select few. It also gave Edie the piece of mind of knowing she was doing what was best for the client not the company. Jarvis Insurance and Financial Strategies founded in 2004 was created on the premise that education and knowledge is the key to help clients find the right path to their future.
Edie's educational background being in finance and education not only helped her to achieve her goals but afforded her the opportunity to offer that to her clients prospects family and friends.  She is also a Senior Financial Advisor one of America's Premiere Experts in Annuities Retirement Income Specialist and an LTCi Specialist.
To learn more about Edie please visit and Contact her by phone at 1-888-377-7740
More About Edie Jarvis 
Edie is a member of The Million Dollar Round Table The National Association Of Insurance & Financial Advisors Member Of America's Premier Experts and National Directory Of Insurance among many more.
Edie has been awarded with many honors such as Sales Excellent Award Award For Outstanding Achievement and Top Of The Table just to name a few.
Her biggest accomplishment and joy is spending her spare time with her daughter. Edie and her family reside in Ormond Beach Florida.
###
